deliveryInfo.title: Sushi Delivery in Warsaw
deliveryInfo.first: Every time someone orders sushi or rolls, the number of happy people in the world increases. It's easy to become happy - just order sushi in Warsaw.
deliveryInfo.second: In our menu, you will find not only delicious and fresh sushi and rolls but also other Japanese dishes.
deliveryInfo.third: The Neptunes Sushi menu includes classic rolls and sushi (with fish and rice or with rice and seafood) as well as various variations of them (spicy, hot, baked, vegetarian).
deliveryInfo.fifth: The best sushi rolls are considered to be Philadelphia (classic and various variations). It is a dish with cream cheese, fish (we use fillets of delicate Norwegian salmon without bones), and cucumber. This combination makes the dish surprisingly tasty and delicate.
deliveryInfo.sixth: On top of that, there is also California roll (in various versions). If you've never tried this dish before, try ordering the sushi roll "California" with original ingredients: salmon, avocado, and flying fish roe. We also have options with shrimp and eel.

points.first: Futomaki. These rolls have a three-ingredient filling. Our sushi chefs strive to use combinations of ingredients that not only allow you to enjoy the taste of the dish but also provide beautiful flavor nuances.
points.fourth: Hot rolls. They are prepared in the same way as uramaki and futomaki, and additionally fried or deep-fried.

deliveryAdvantage.title: Advantages of Neptune's Sushi Delivery Service
deliveryAdvantage.first: Order sushi online in Warsaw and let us know what you liked and what you didn't. Help us become the best!

points.first: High-quality dishes. We use only fresh ingredients from trusted suppliers and do not store them in the refrigerator; we start cooking right away.
points.second: Large portions. In Warsaw, you can order sushi for various gatherings, both for a quiet dinner and for a large company.
points.sixth: The ability to place a pre-order.

firstBanner.title: Get 10% off when you pick up in person!
firstBanner.subtitle: Pick up your order from any location and enjoy a discount

secondBanner.title: Happy Birthday!
secondBanner.subtitle: 10% off for the birthday boy within a week

firstCard.title: Delivery
firstCard.heading: Save 10%
firstCard.subtitle: Orders can be placed a minimum of 40 minutes before pick-up. For self-pickup, we offer a 10% discount on every order.

secondCard.title: Payment
secondCard.heading: Cash
secondCard.subtitle: Payment in cash to the courier or at the restaurant upon order pickup.

thirdCard.heading: Card
thirdCard.subtitle: You have the option to pay by card on the website (service available for Visa, MasterCard) and to the courier upon receipt.

about.title: About Us
about.firstP: The Neptunes Sushi project it is our new startup in sushi delivery
